function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced occupancy in buildings during lockdown","Impact":"Increased risk of stagnant water in the water systems, leading to microbial growth and Legionella contamination","Mitigation":"Frequent flushing of water systems, regular maintenance, and monitoring of water quality","Technologies":"Automated flushing systems, water quality monitoring sensors","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, health and safety personnel","Owner":"Building management, health and safety personnel"},{"Description":"High energy consumption in unoccupied buildings","Impact":"Increased energy costs and environmental impact due to unnecessary energy use","Mitigation":"Implementation of energy-efficient technology, automation of energy systems, and regular energy audits","Technologies":"Smart building technology, occupancy sensors, energy management systems","People":"Facility managers, energy efficiency experts, building occupants","Owner":"Building management, energy efficiency experts"},{"Description":"Inadequate indoor air quality in buildings","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne disease transmission and poor occupant health","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, and filtration systems","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality sensors, advanced filtration systems","People":"Building occupants, health and safety personnel, facility managers","Owner":"Building management, health and safety personnel"}]}
